typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Year as date 'yyyy',
		Month as string,
		Country as string,
		Calorie_category as string,
		Flavor as string,
		Zone as string,
		Product_code as string,
		Product_name as string,
		Sales as float '###.##'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
